attributes.title: EA Sports Part 4: Pros and Contracts
attributes.description: For 30 years, EA Sports has been the dominant publisher of sports themed games. In this fourth episode of our retrospective, see how a rift between Electronic Arts and Sega birthed EA Sports' gridiron dynasty.
attributes.display_title: EA Sports Part 4: Pros and Contracts
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: EA Sports Part 5: Overtime
attributes.description: For 30 years, EA Sports has been the dominant publisher of sports themed games. In this fifth episode of our retrospective, see how EA Sports battled lawsuits and disgruntled customers to cement their spot as champion of sports games."
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Gearbox Software Pt 1: Low Gear
attributes.description: Since its founding in 1999, Gearbox Software has built a reputation as one of the most exciting and innovative developers in all of gaming. In this first episode of our retrospective, see how Gearbox CEO Randy Pitchford kicked his gaming dreams into gear.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Gearbox Software Pt 2: High Gear
attributes.description: Since its founding in 1999, Gearbox Software has built a reputation as one of the most exciting and innovative developers in all of gaming. In this second episode of our retrospective, see how the success of Gearbox's first original IP lead their charge to the Borderlands.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: X-COM Part 1: British Invasion
attributes.description: Since it's debut in 1994, the X-COM series has been at the forefront of the strategy genre. In part one of our retrospective, see how British developer Julian Gollop looked to the stars to reinvent the turn based strategy game.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: X-COM Pt 2: X-Communicated
attributes.description: Since it's debut in 1994, the X-COM series has been at the forefront of the strategy genre. In part two of our retrospective, see how X-COM traveled from the farthest reaches of space to the depths of the sea.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: X-COM Pt 3: Extinguished
attributes.description: Since it's debut in 1994, the X-COM series has been at the forefront of the strategy genre. In part three of our retrospective, see how Microprose's financial woes led to X-COM's fall from space.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: XCOM Part 4: Aliens: Resurrection
attributes.description: Since it's debut in 1994, the X-COM series has been at the forefront of the strategy genre. In part four of our retrospective, see how Firaxis and Take Two pulled XCOM out of the black hole of obscurity.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Nintendo Part 1: Leave Luck To Heaven
attributes.description: There is arguably no company more synonymous with gaming than Nintendo. In this first part of our retrospective, see how Nintendo's ascension to gaming royalty was in the cards.
attributes.display_title: Nintendo Part 1: Leave Luck To Heaven
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Nintendo Part 2: Pipe Dreams Do Come True
attributes.description: There is arguably no company more synonymous with gaming than Nintendo. In this second part of our retrospective, see how Nintendo's success in arcades and in homes wasn't a pipe dream.
attributes.display_title: Nintendo Part 2: Pipe Dreams Do Come True
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Nintendo Part 3: Going To War
attributes.description: There is arguably no company more synonymous with gaming than Nintendo. In this third part of our retrospective, see how Sega's 16-bit system shook the house of Mario and ignited the industry's most famed console war.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Nintendo Part 4: Revenge Is A Disc Best Served Cold
attributes.description: There is arguably no company more synonymous with gaming than Nintendo. In this fourth part of our retrospective, see how a contract dispute with Sony began Nintendo's fall from grace.
attributes.display_title: Nintendo Part 4: Revenge Is A Disc Best Served Cold
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Nintendo Part 5: Boxed In
attributes.description: There is arguably no company more synonymous with gaming than Nintendo. In this fifth part of our retrospective, see how Microsoft's foray into the game industry led to Nintendo hitting rock bottom.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Nintendo Part 6: Wiidemption
attributes.description: There is arguably no company more synonymous with gaming than Nintendo. In this sixth part of our retrospective, see how Nintendo moved back to the top of the gaming industry by embracing the casual gamer.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: Nintendo Part 7: Wii United
attributes.description: There is arguably no company more synonymous with gaming than Nintendo. In this seventh part of our retrospective, see how Nintendo's leap into the third dimension yielded an uncertain future.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: 2012 Pt 1: Double Trouble
attributes.description: The year 2012 was one of gaming's most transformative in recent memory. In this first episode of year in review, see how the ugly side of the gaming business and the rise of Kickstarter shook the industry to its core.
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us

attributes.title: 2012 Pt 2: The Rhode To Ruin
attributes.description: 2012 was one of gaming's most transformative years in recent memory. In this second episode of our year in review, see how the disintegration of 38 Studios and the ascension of Kickstarter could lead to a new paradigm for the gaming industry."
attributes.show_title: All Your History Are Belong To Us
